article_title: Hike, soak in a natural hot spring in New Mexico's funky Jemez area
article_text:
Thanks for reading Fredericksburg.com. This is your last free article on Fredericksburg.com this 30-day period. If you are a current 2-day or more subscriber to the Free Lance-Star newspaper you are granted an all-access pass to the website and digital newspaper replica. og.description: Fair warning, hikers. If a little nudity makes you squeamish, steer clear of the picturesque little hot springs scattered in the hills around the Jemez area of New Mexico.
